name: Kingdom Bash (Alpha)
description:
A fresh take on classic friendship-ruining party multiplayer action.

Kingdom Bash™ is a fantasy action game for up to 4 players. Developed as a love letter to classic games, with the intention of bringing back couch multiplayer. Throw a party and encourage friends as they demolish each other in fast-paced multiplayer. Designed to be easy to learn, yet hard to master. Choose your powers and use the environment around you to defeat your opponents. Enjoy authentic retro sights and sounds as you make friends in cooperative play, or ruin friendships in competitive modes.

NOTICE!!

Kingdom Bash™ is still in development.

A full, paid version will be released when I feel it's ready!

Enjoy a free demo version & stay tuned!

CURRENT FEATURES *
  • 4 playable characters
  • 6 versus & co-op multiplayer modes
  • 25+ fantasy arenas
  • 5 battle powerups
  • 8 dangerous monsters
  • Original authentic chiptune soundtrack
  • All created by one little guy with a big heart

* In the full version

PLANNED FEATURES
  • Single player / Co-op adventure mode
  • Unique environments & stages
  • Monsters of all shapes, sizes, & smarts
  • A handful of powerups
  • Global stats database
  • Additionally original chippy tunes
  • And much more!
RECOMMENDED SPECS

The game is designed to run at 60fps. If it isn't running well, try the following:

  • Toggle Fullscreen mode On/Off.
  • Toggle VSync On/Off.

If that doesn't help, please let me know! I'm still working on optimization.

CONTROLS

Requires Xbox 360, Xbox One, or DualShock 4 (Use DS4Windows) controllers. Use x360ce to emulate the Xbox 360 controller for usage!

Left Stick or D-pad: Movement

Right Stick: Aim

Right Trigger: Hold to prepare, release to Attack

Left Trigger: Dash / Catch

Y Button: Toggle Item priority

DEVELOPMENT PLANS

Hi, I'm Matthew Alan Estock!

While I am the sole developer of Kingdom Bash™, I owe it to my friends to keep me working on it. Almost every Sunday, Kyle gets the pizza, Jacob brings his brewed beer, I bring the latest build of the game, and we all get together to test out the latest features I've put together!

You can follow the game's progress on Trello or the official website. Kingdom Bash™ is also on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

Patch notes will be kept on Tumblr until I find a better way to organize them!
